graph_title: The share of beneficiaries of old age, disability and in case of losing a breadwinner to the total number of population at the end of the year
indicator_name: The share of beneficiaries of old age, disability and in case of losing a breadwinner to the total number of population at the end of the year
national_indicator_description: The indicator of the share of beneficiaries in the case of old age, disability and loss of breadwinner at the end of the year from the total number of populations is the share of the beneficiaries at the end of the year from the total number of populations in the case of old age, disability and the loss of breadwinner.
computation_definitions: State benefit is regular or one-time financial assistance provided from the state budget.
computation_calculations: The ratio of beneficiaries for old age, disability or loss of breadwinner to the population.
